subject: Re: Thanks for your recent application, we are ready to lend you some cash regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire TODAY):
$471,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your your credit report will not disqualify you!
http://zodqunoot.com/
